artist: Painter: After Adriaen van de Velde; Etcher: Carl Guillaume Weisbrod
description: pastoral landscape with shepherdess seated on a river bank surrounded by 2 cows and some sheep; holding a child; shepherd asleep in hut at right
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription
on sheet in black: 109 / Adr. v  Velde pinx.  grave par Weisbrod  a Hembourg en 1781. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | on sheet in pencil: 2-532
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 109
title: Print
